name: KLM Asia 777-306ER [PH-BVC] Landing and Taxi at Calgary Airport
description:
The KLM 777-300ER returns yet again! Here we have PH-BVC (the same aircraft that came last year) landing and taxiing close up at Calgary International Airport, operating as an equipment change from the standard 777-200ER. ATC is included, and the sound of the thrust reversers engaging is audible as well, with that trademark GE90 whine. I apologize for the shakiness on the taxiing shots, the crew taxiied quicker than usual and I had less time to get to my location. Regardless, I hope you enjoy this quick shot of the mighty 77W!

Thanks for watching! Please comment, rate, and subscribe!


FLIGHT INFO
Airline: KLM Royal Dutch Airlines (KLM/KL)
Aircraft: Boeing 777-300ER (B77W)
Aircraft Name: "Nationaal Park Sian Ka'an / Sian Ka'an National Park"
Livery: KLM Asia
Engines: 2x GE90-115B
Registration: PH-BVC
Route: AMS-YYC
Callsign: KLM 677 heavy
Runway used: 35R
Local Time: 1345
FlightAware: http://flightaware.com/live/flight/PHBVC
